mapper.select: SELECT COMD_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL CD, COLLEGE C, DEPARTMENT D, STUDENT S WHERE S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND D.COL_CD = C.COL_CD AND C.COL_CD = CD.COMD_CD AND S.STU_CD = #{userCd}
SELECT * FROM LECTURE WHERE LEC_CD = #{lecCd}

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LS.LEC_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT, CRTR_MP, CRTR_FP, CRTR_TP, CRTR_AP, USER_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL,USER_MAIL, USER_DEPO, D.DEP_CD, COL_CD, DEP_NM, DEP_MRC, DEP_MOC, DEP_CRC, DEP_COC, DEP_CAP, DEP_TEL, DEP_FEE, COL_NM, WL.STU_CD, WL.LEC_CD, U.USER_NM, WP_CON FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS, DEPARTMENT D, WISH_LECTURE WL, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, WEEKPLAN W WHERE LA.LECA_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND D.DEP_CD = LA.DEP_CD AND WL.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND W.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LECA_TRG = #{stuYear} AND LECA_SEM = #{stuSem} AND LECA_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')

SELECT ENR_CD, STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, ENR_REG, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, PRO_CD, APP_CD, DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE FROM ENROLMENT E, LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA WHERE E.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.LECA_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND LA.LECA_SEM = ( CASE WHEN EXTRACT (MONTH FROM SYSDATE) IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd}

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LS.LEC_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT, D.DEP_CD, COL_CD, DEP_NM, DEP_MRC, DEP_MOC, DEP_CRC, DEP_COC, DEP_CAP, DEP_TEL, DEP_FEE, COL_NM, WL.STU_CD, WL.LEC_CD, U.USER_NM FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS, DEPARTMENT D, WISH_LECTURE WL, PROFESSOR P, USERS U WHERE LA.LECA_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND D.DEP_CD = LA.DEP_CD AND WL.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LECA_TRG = #{stuYear} AND LECA_SEM = #{stuSem} AND LECA_NM LIKE '%' || #{lecNm} || '%'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISH_LECTURE WHERE STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND LEC_CD = #{lecCd}
mapper.insert:
SELECT ENROLMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ENROLMENT(ENR_CD, STU_CD, LEC_CD) VALUES (#{enrCd}, #{stuCd}, #{lecCd})
mapper.select:
SELECT E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, C.COMD_NM || ' ' || SUBSTR(LA.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' AS ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_DEPO,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, COMMON_DETAIL C, ROOM R, ENROLMENT E WHERE E.LEC_CD = LC.LEC_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND C.COMD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 2 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) BETWEEN 8 AND 12) )

SELECT E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, C.COMD_NM || ' ' || SUBSTR(LA.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' AS ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_DEPO,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, COMMON_DETAIL C, ROOM R, ENROLMENT E WHERE E.LEC_CD = LC.LEC_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND C.COMD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND LC.LEC_CD = #{lecCd}

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LS.LEC_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT, D.DEP_CD, COL_CD, DEP_NM, DEP_MRC, DEP_MOC, DEP_CRC, DEP_COC, DEP_CAP, DEP_TEL, DEP_FEE, COL_NM, WL.STU_CD, WL.LEC_CD, U.USER_NM FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS, DEPARTMENT D, WISH_LECTURE WL, PROFESSOR P, USERS U WHERE LA.LECA_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND D.DEP_CD = LA.DEP_CD AND WL.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LECA_TRG = #{stuYear} AND LECA_SEM = #{stuSem} AND LECA_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')
AND LA.DEP_CD = #{keyword}

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, LA.PRO_CD, APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LS.LEC_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT, D.DEP_CD, COL_CD, DEP_NM, DEP_MRC, DEP_MOC, DEP_CRC, DEP_COC, DEP_CAP, DEP_TEL, DEP_FEE, COL_NM, WL.STU_CD, WL.LEC_CD, U.USER_NM FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS, DEPARTMENT D, WISH_LECTURE WL, PROFESSOR P, USERS U WHERE LA.LECA_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND D.DEP_CD = LA.DEP_CD AND WL.LEC_CD(+) = L.LEC_CD AND P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LECA_TRG = #{stuYear} AND LECA_SEM = #{stuSem} AND LECA_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND LA.LECA_TYPE = #{keyword}

SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LN.LECN_CD) RNUM, E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.ENR_REG,
LN.LECN_CD, LN.LEC_CD, LN.LECN_TITLE, LN.LECN_CON, LN.LECN_REG, LN.LECN_UDT, LN.LECN_CNT, L.LEC_HCNT, L.LEC_STAT, LA.PRO_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.COMD_CD
FROM LECTURE_NOTICE LN
JOIN LECTURE L ON LN.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN ENROLMENT E ON L.LEC_CD = E.LEC_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_CD = P.PRO_CD WHERE E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND L.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} ) T WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE_NOTICE WHERE LEC_CD = #{lecCd}

SELECT DISTINCT LN.LECN_CD, LN.LEC_CD, LN.LECN_TITLE, LN.LECN_CON, LN.LECN_REG, LN.LECN_UDT, LN.LECN_CNT, L.LEC_HCNT, L.LEC_STAT, LA.PRO_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
F.FILE_SN, F.FILE_CD, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_ORNM, F.FILE_SVNM, F.FILE_EXTSN, F.FILE_CON, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_USED
FROM LECTURE_NOTICE LN
JOIN LECTURE L ON LN.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN ENROLMENT E ON E.LEC_CD = LN.LEC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES_DETAIL F ON LN.LECN_CD = F.FILE_CD
WHERE LN.LECN_CD = #{lecnCd}

SELECT T.TASK_CD, T.TASK_NM, T.TASK_CON, T.TASK_REG, T.TASK_EDDT,
E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, C.COMD_NM || ' ' || SUBSTR(LA.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' AS ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_DEPO,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, COMMON_DETAIL C, ROOM R, ENROLMENT E, TASK T
WHERE E.LEC_CD = LC.LEC_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND C.COMD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = T.LEC_CD AND T.TASK_EDDT + 1 > SYSDATE AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND LC.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} ORDER BY T.TASK_EDDT DESC

SELECT T.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LD.LECD_DT DESC) RNUM, E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.ENR_REG,
LD.LECD_CD, LD.LEC_CD, LD.LECD_DT, LD.LECD_TITLE, LD.LECD_CON, L.LEC_HCNT, L.LEC_STAT, LA.PRO_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.COMD_CD
FROM LECTURE_DATA LD
JOIN LECTURE L ON LD.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN ENROLMENT E ON L.LEC_CD = E.LEC_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_CD = P.PRO_CD WHERE E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND L.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} ) T

SELECT DISTINCT LD.LECD_CD, LD.LEC_CD, LD.LECD_DT, LD.LECD_TITLE, LD.LECD_CON, L.LEC_HCNT, L.LEC_STAT, LA.PRO_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
U.USER_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL,
F.FILE_SN, F.FILE_CD, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_ORNM, F.FILE_SVNM, F.FILE_EXTSN, F.FILE_CON, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_USED
FROM LECTURE_DATA LD
JOIN LECTURE L ON LD.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN ENROLMENT E ON E.LEC_CD = LD.LEC_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES_DETAIL F ON LD.LECD_CD = F.FILE_CD
WHERE LD.LECD_CD = #{lecdCd}

SELECT DISTINCT T.TASK_CD, T.TASK_NM, T.TASK_CON, T.TASK_REG, T.TASK_EDDT,
L.LEC_HCNT, L.LEC_STAT, LA.PRO_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
U.USER_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL,
F.FILE_SN, F.FILE_CD, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_ORNM, F.FILE_SVNM, F.FILE_EXTSN, F.FILE_CON, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_USED
FROM TASK T
JOIN LECTURE L ON T.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN ENROLMENT E ON E.LEC_CD = T.LEC_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PRO_CD = LA.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES_DETAIL F ON T.TASK_CD = F.FILE_CD
WHERE T.TASK_CD = #{taskCd}

SELECT T.TASK_CD, T.TASK_NM, T.TASK_CON, T.TASK_REG, T.TASK_EDDT,
TS.TSUB_CD, TS.STU_CD, TS.TSUB_DT, TS.TSUB_SCORE,
E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, C.COMD_NM || ' ' || SUBSTR(LA.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' AS ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_DEPO,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, COMMON_DETAIL C, ROOM R, ENROLMENT E, TASK T LEFT OUTER JOIN TASK_SUBMIT TS ON T.TASK_CD = TS.TASK_CD WHERE E.LEC_CD = LC.LEC_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND C.COMD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = T.LEC_CD AND T.TASK_EDDT < SYSDATE -1 AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd}
AND LC.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} ORDER BY T.TASK_EDDT DESC

SELECT E.ENR_CD, E.STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, C.COMD_NM || ' ' || SUBSTR(LA.ROOM_CD, 7) || '호' AS ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_DEPO,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, COMMON_DETAIL C, ROOM R, ENROLMENT E WHERE E.LEC_CD = LC.LEC_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND LA.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND C.COMD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR < EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM < CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) )
SELECT CRTR_CD FROM GRADE_CRITERIA WHERE LEC_CD = #{lecCd}
